block_comment: This block determines the next state of a 3-bit signal 'lines'. If 'vid_locked' is not asserted, 'lines_next' is reset to zero. Otherwise, if 'start_new_line' is asserted, 'lines_next' shifts current 'lines' left by one bit and inversely concatenates the 'update_sample' signal; if not, it retains the current 'lines' value.
